title: How a Festive Night in Seoul Turned Deadly
description: There were few police officers around as a mass of revelers swelled. From within the crowd came calls to “push, push” and a big shove, according to witnesses. Then, they began to fall.
dc:creator: Choe Sang-Hun, John Yoon, Paul Mozur, Victoria Kim, Lee Su-Hyun and Jin Yu Young
media:credit: Chang W. Lee/The New York Times
media:description: A memorial on Sunday for the victims of the crowd surge in the Itaewon district of Seoul, the South Korean capital.
